student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! Do you like pizza? I think many people enjoy it. What’s your favorite food?
My favorite food is pasta. I eat it often.
Pasta is great! Do you like it with tomato sauce or cream sauce? Many people have different ways to enjoy it.
I like it with tomato sauce. It taste very good.
Tomato sauce is a classic choice! Do you also like adding cheese or herbs to your pasta? Many people do that to make it even tastier.
Yes, I like add cheese. It make more delicious.
Cheese makes everything better! It’s nice to know we both enjoy pasta with tomato sauce and cheese. Maybe next time we can talk about other foods we like. Thanks for chatting!
You're welcome! I like talk about food. What other food do you enjoy?
Good job! You have completed the task. I enjoy many foods, like sushi and salads. Talk to you later!
